**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-10T04:24:31Z" title="07/10/2016 04:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 10, 2016</time> by winged**
Is that <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> Issue fixed? That buried launchpad issues fixed?

Why Aren't you making it for stock KSP? 

First of all, there is NO RVE working in <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> in ksp v1.1.2 and v1.1.3! What is the use then of these mods if i dont get visual enhancements?

Second thing, People who are playing in stock solar system, will not be able to enjoy this AWESOME MOD?

We, are waiting for a stock update for months... Can you Please make it work in stock solar system?

(Sorry if i void any terms of licence!)

Firstly, RVE does work in <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> on KSP v1.1.2. My install of <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> can verify this. Just read back in the RVE thread to find the guide on how to install it. Secondly, this mod uses Kerbal Konstructs to place the assets made by the <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr> and contributors. This means that it's entirely possible for you to download this mod, and place all the launchsites where you want them in the stock scale. Iirc, [@selfish_meme](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/125899-selfish_meme/) did this, except in SSRSS. Same concept. Once you've done that, you can also redistribute it! The license this mod is released under (CC BY-SA 2.0) allows you to do so, as long as you credit appropriately, use the same license, and state what changes you've made. Have fun! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

RLS works best is <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/<abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>, the textures wont match stock, and it will all just look gross in stock
